patthana15.76:1.1_0: Saraṇaṁ pītisahagataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaraṇo napītisahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana15.76:2.1_0: Araṇaṁ pītisahagataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaraṇo napītisahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṁ.
patthana15.76:3.1_1: ārammaṇe dve …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate cattāri.
patthana15.76:4.1_0: Saraṇaṁ sukhasahagataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaraṇo nasukhasahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana15.76:5.1_0: Araṇaṁ sukhasahagataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaraṇo nasukhasahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṁ.
patthana15.76:6.1_1: ārammaṇe dve …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate cattāri.
patthana15.76:7.1_0: Saraṇaṁ upekkhāsahagataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaraṇo naupekkhāsahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …. Hetuyā cattāri,
patthana15.76:7.1_1: ārammaṇe dve …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate cattāri.
